roleset.name: move slightly
roleset.note: NUDGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nudge' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 17.1-1 and 20, Framenet entries Manipulation and Cause to move. (from nudge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: nudge-v: the one example
example.text: ... including ... and action-1 by the Federal Reserve [*]-1 to nudge U.S. rates lower.

example.name: nudge-v: all args except agent
example.text: Revenue nudged up 3.4% to $904 million from $874 million in last year's third quarter.

example.name: nudge-v
example.text: Harris Trust 's Mr. Woodland noted that the unit continues to show resilience in the face of a barrage of `` headline negatives '' in recent weeks , including rate increases in Europe and Japan , aggressive central bank intervention , a 190 - point plunge in New York stock prices , an unexpectedly poor U.S. trade report and action by the Federal Reserve *PRO* to nudge U.S. rates lower .

roleset.name: touch lightly
roleset.note: NUDGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nudge' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 17.1-1 and 20, Framenet entries Manipulation and Cause to move. (from nudge.02-v predicate notes)

role.descr: touched with, if separate from agent

example.name: wink wink nudge nudge
example.text: John nudge Mary with his elbow.
